level.heading:
ACCESS TO DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA RECORDS (ยง 1-1111) In executing its responsibilities, the Members and the representatives of andnvestigators for the Board are authorized to:
(a) Access all facilities, files, and databases of District government agenciesn order to obtain files, electronic and paper records, reports and documents,nd other material available to District government agencies, which may relateo the Board’s inquiry into a reported violation of the Act.
(b) Request such information or assistance as may be necessary for carrying outhe duties and responsibilities of the Board, as provided in Mayor’s Order003-156, from any District, federal, state, or local government agency.
(c) Seek information from parties outside the District government, includingovernment contractors, which may be relevant to an investigation.
SOURCE
level.text: Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 7968 (August 13,004) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 4402 (May1, 2007).
